title: 第三人称可越肩视角改良
author: yhjj
txt_content:
这是config文件夹下的ShoulderSurfing.cfg文件用记事本编辑时的翻译：
# Configuration file#配置文件######################################### general#一般########################################general {一般{# Whether or not to show a crosshair in the center of the screen if nothing is in range of you#是否如果不在范围内你显示在屏幕中心的十字线B:alwaysHaveCrosshair=true乙：alwayshavecrosshair =真实# If enabled, then the crosshair moves around to line up with the block you are facing.#如果启用，然后十字线绕着与你面对嵌线。B:isCrosshairDynamic=true乙：iscrosshairdynamic =真实# Whether or not rotation adjustment has limits#是否旋转调整范围B:isRotationUnlimited=false乙：isrotationunlimited = false# Whether or not zoom adjustment has limits#是否缩放调整范围B:isZoomUnlimited=false乙：iszoomunlimited = false# Whether or not to hide the player model if the camera gets too close to it#是否如果相机太接近藏玩家模型B:keepCameraOutOfHead=true乙：keepcameraoutofhead =真实# If rotation is limited this is the maximum amount如果这是#转动是有限的最大数量D:rotationMaximum=60.0D：rotationmaximum = 60# If rotation is limited this is the minimum amount#如果旋转限制这是最低金额D:rotationMinimum=-60.0D：rotationminimum = 60# Third person camera rotation第三的人#相机旋转D:rotationOffset=-52.0D：rotationoffset = 52# Whether or not to show the crosshairs farther than normal#是否显示十字线比正常B:showCrosshairFarther=true乙：showcrosshairfarther =真实# If zoom is limited this is the maximum amount如果这是#变焦是有限的最大数量D:zoomMaximum=2.0D：zoommaximum = 2# If zoom is limited this is the minimum amount#如果变焦有限，这是最低限度的D:zoomMinimum=0.30000001192092896D：zoomminimum = 0.3000000119209289# Third person camera zoom第三的人#相机变焦D:zoomOffset=0.61000013D：zoomoffset = 0.61000013}}

F5后改视角额默认键位是
J【左拉镜头】
K【后拉镜头】
L【右拉镜头】
I【拉近镜头】

详情请转到：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-110143-1-1.html

我才不会告诉你楼兰在偷懒.w.
